description: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0ntn","text":"This protocol describes the procedure to perform RT-qPCR for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 N gene and a processing control (BRSV) in RNA extracted from wastewater samples. For samples obtained with a Moore swab, results will indicate the presence or absence of each target. For grab or composite wastewater samples, results may be used to estimate the concentration of the target in the original sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Rollins School of Public Health, Emory University

keywords: wastewater, SARS-CoV-2, real-time, qPCR, RT-qPCR, Singleplex, N1, N1 target

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dp1sh","text":"Ensure that assay mix is prepared in advance for both N1 and BRSV assays (primers and probes mixed at appropriate concentrations and stored for future use at   , see Appendix I for details).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":158,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cj9fh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AB741080590D11EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nqjo","text":"Ensure that standard curve aliquots have been prepared for SARS-CoV-2 (see Appendix II for details).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abgde","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fkopp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2t4dh","text":"Standards should be made for list target cp/well and used for grab or composite samples.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"86nqq","text":"Swab samples require only a positive control.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"p4ja","text":"Spray surface of hood and wipe pipettes with 10% bleach. Let dry, and repeat with 70% ethanol. Wipe off carefully.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9lcbr","text":"Retrieve RNA from wastewater samples and thaw on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a37v0","text":"Thaw the reagents from Invitrogen™, primers, and probes at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c12mp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EFE54630590D11EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58j18","text":"Prepare spreadsheet list of all samples to run to set up PCR template and to establish volumes needed for each reagent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4l1sk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1iedv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"req7","text":"For grab/composite samples, include standard curve for SARS-CoV-2 and two \"no template controls\" (NTCs).","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7mkl7","text":"If only using swab samples, include only a positive control and and two no template controls (NTCs)","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bsgg","text":"Place all reagents on ice, including molecular biological grade water aliquot.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5c9tm","text":"Confirm hood light is off to prevent denaturation of probes before starting mixture preparation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"q1gu","text":"Prepare two 1.7 mL microcentrifuge tubes labeled "N" and "B". Create the master mixes for each assay by mixing components under a clean hood in the order written in the tables below. Utilize the spreadsheet template to calculate the total volume of each component needed for the number of samples to be run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vfsc","text":" μL         13.3X         1X            Primers         --         4 μM         300 nM            Probe         --         2 μM         150 nM            Template   RNA         5 μL         –         –            Total   volume         20.0 μL         –         -- 200 nM            [16] [17] [18] [19] [20] Template RNA         5 μL         –         –            Total   volume         20.0 μL         –         -- {"blocks":[{"key":"7lnt1","text":"Vortex both N and B mixes for 5 seconds, then spin down for 5 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ts5","text":"Aliquot   of the master mix to each designated well on the PCR plate. Change pipette tips between wells and dispose used pipette tips into trash.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"rfp3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"658B0080591011EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"df3sj","text":"Move the PCR plate to the lab’s PCR bench for adding template. Do not add template in the hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5584s","text":"Spray surface of PCR bench and wipe pipettes with 10% bleach and then repeat with 70% ethanol. Wipe off carefully.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2nrm","text":"Retrieve thawed RNA from wastewater samples. Vortex briefly and spin down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eflq8","text":"Add   of RNA template into the appropriate well on the PCR template, changing pipette tips in between each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"66s9f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"AFB905D0591011EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dsdah","text":"For the PCR no template control (NTC), add   of molecular grade water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"66ag6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"F617DAB0591011EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qcql","text":"For the extraction negative control, add   of control produced each time when extracting the RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ibm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"FB562B80591011EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jo8i","text":"For positive control for Moore swab samples, add   of diluted inactivated SARS-CoV-2 sample stored in   freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ji8s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"03CBD990591111EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0F4FB200591111EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"948sc","text":"For the standard curve for grab or composite samples, add of standards to designated wells in order, starting from the number of lowest to highest genomic copies (gc).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aipaq","text":" Std G Std F Std E Std D Std C 10 gc 100 gc 1,000 gc 10,000 gc 100,000 gc ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":161}],"data":{}},{"key":"82voh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef5pr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"1F0A7D60591111EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","0_4":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","1_4":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[94,90,87,81,84],"data":[[" Std G "," Std F "," Std E "," Std D "," Std C "],[" 10 gc "," 100 gc "," 1,000 gc "," 10,000 gc "," 100,000 gc "]],"guid":"4EBFFC36591111EC84510A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8ef5m","text":"gc = genomic copies","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":[],"printData":[[" Std G "," Std F "," Std E "," Std D "," Std C "],[" 10 gc "," 100 gc "," 1,000 gc "," 10,000 gc "," 100,000 gc "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cmpcm","text":"Once plate is completed, seal the wells with adhesive sealing film and spin down for   on a balanced 96-well plate centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1e8o2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"39FABF8061D711EC9FA85DA25A210CED","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ud7f","text":"Set up well plate template:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vsaj","text":"Load the appropriate fluorophores into the appropriate wells (FAM is used for this assay).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2matb","text":"Select for designated controls (no template controls, negative, and positive), standards (with concentrations), and unknowns (samples).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mkpk","text":"Name wells for samples accordingly.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bse6","text":"Vortex the mixture on a benchtop vortex and place into a   freezer until needed for PCR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"egtgq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"68181300591B11EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cqgp","text":"After viewing results, utilize the following decision tree to determine if results pass QA/QC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"176j9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es6tv","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5dr11","text":"If both Ct values are present and the Ct difference is less than 2 --\u003e Positive","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fks45","text":"If the lower Ct value is less than 36 --\u003e Quantifiable positive","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84pgh","text":"If the lower Ct value is greater than 36 --\u003e Non-quantifiable positive","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4ckh","text":"If one Ct value is greater than 36 while the other is negative --\u003e Negative","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lvd5","text":"If one Ct value is less than 36 while the other is negative --\u003e Rerun sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3m601","text":"If both Ct values are less than 36 and the Ct difference is greater than 2 --\u003e Rerun sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8dqr","text":"If any Ct value of BRSV is negative --\u003e Rerun sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vvda","text":"For re-rerun results, if both Ct values are present and the difference is greater than 2 --\u003e Positive, average the Ct values. Otherwise, follow the same aforementioned guideline","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"CD8D1C60592211EC8D125DF58A7C5E15","height":306,"id":202014,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"50h4d","text":"Decision tree for interpreting qPCR results","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"qPCR_decision-tree.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gfjabkpzx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gfi8bkpzx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gfi9bkpzx.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gfi7bkpzx.webp","width":550}}}}
